p: Gallic acid, protocatehuic acid, (+)-catechin, vanillic acid, syringic acid, (âˆ’)-epicatechin, p-coumaric acid, salicylic acid and hesperidin were detected at 280 nm, whereas chlorogenic acid, caffeic acid, ferulic acid, rutin, rosmarinic acid, quercetin and kaempherol were detected at 360 nm. Results were calculated with standards curves for each analytical standard and expressed as mg/100 g DW.
